Synopsis:
Mixed-art digital animation with live action, "Hop" tells the story of Fred (James Marsden), a young unemployed who accidentally injures Easter Bunny and he has no choice but to welcome in his home while recovering, thus leading to surreal and funny situations. The Morancos lend their voices to the chickens Charles and Philip, two of the funniest movie, and David Hasselhoff has a brief role in it.

- Movie mixture of live action and CGI image.
